name: Dash Deception
summary:
Oh no, something terrible has happened! While on your journey to collect the ring pieces to restore the Riddle of Heaven, Malak has infiltrated the Ball Room and kidnapped Bierce!

Now you must journey back to the nightmare dimensions in order to rescue Bierce from a fate far worse than death...

Welcome to Dash Deception! A fan game based off of the popular indie horror game Dark Deception, which takes a twist on the original gameplay in a platforming/side scrolling adventure!

Revisit previous nightmares from Dark Deception with new layouts and brand new gameplay mechanics!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: fangame
  • 游戏引擎: Unreal Engine 4
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2020年12月7日
  • 售价: Free
